newThings: Try to walk through a door that's marked "pull"

Paint your car to look like a law enforcement vehicle and then drive recklessly
Pull an all nighter every night for a week
Convert the internet into binary and send it over telegraph wires
Try to break the world record for longest human chain of people chewing gum

Generate a new big bang by colliding two black holes
Force everyone in the world to wear the same outfit
Train a plague of locusts to mow your lawn
Attempt to cross the Pacific Ocean in a bathtub
Use a chainsaw to make a sundae
Schedule a haircut with a rattlesnake
